div.pre: 1154 Ephesus, 1905 (389) Burial: c. 600-590 B.C. (Robinson) Contents: 19 EL. Pot hoard from Artemision Unc. mint (goat): 1 half; 3 thirds; 1 twelfth (two cocks): 2 halves; 7 thirds, 1 sixth, 1 twelfth (lion hd. facing): 1 twelfth (unc. type): 1 twelfth (without type): 1 sixth Disposition: Istanbul References as no. 1193 above Noe gives a total of 93 EL, combining this hd. with no. 1153 above and several stray finds
